plot: Tenma escapes with Milch and tries to warn Eva that she is in danger. Eva is staying in room 402 of the Hotel Steigent. Tenma is unable to contact Eva, so he heads to her room.

Tenma tries to warn Eva that she is in danger. He heads to her room 402 at a hotel. Lunge returns to Düsseldorf and confronts Vardemann with his father's past and links to Franz Bonaparta. After Lunge leaves, Tenma accosts Vardemann in his car.
